lines.text: Hm... it looks like there's three things that setting that fire accomplished.
I bet it's one of those three- we should assume that it happened the way they wanted.
The first thing is that the hay went up in smoke, but I don't think that was super important...
The second thing is that it called us to the scene- got the police involved.
And... the third thing is that it burnt Slick Emmup to a crisp.
And I guess it also melted those candles and burnt the table and charred the guy's robes...
Okay, there's actually a lot going on here.
